passiveSkills.name: Damage Dealer
passiveSkills.desc: Gain an ATK UP buff when the combo counter exceeds the threshold. The effect is maintained as long as the combo continues.

advancedSkills.name: Vorpal Strike
advancedSkills.desc: Take aim and release a high-speed lunging thrust. Hold to build up power and deal greater damage.

advancedSkills.name: Nightmare Rain
advancedSkills.desc: A graceful combo that deals Fire and Water damage.

advancedSkills.name: Horizontal Square
advancedSkills.desc: Perform an ultra-fast combo and then attack the surrounding area with a shockwave.

advancedSkills.name: Starburst Stream
advancedSkills.desc: Unleash a chaotic 16-hit combo. The final blow deals massive damage.

advancedSkills.name: Heavy Attack
advancedSkills.desc: Stronger than a Normal Attack. Use after a Normal Attack combo to branch into a Combo Finish. Hold the button for Sonic Leap, a charging slash attack.

advancedSkills.name: Heavy Attack
advancedSkills.desc: Stronger than a Normal Attack. Use after a Normal Attack combo to branch into a Combo Finish. Hold the button for Sonic Leap, a charging slash attack.
